name: On Key Up: A Game for Keyboards (itch)
name_original: On Key Up: A Game for Keyboards (itch)
description:
Get to know your keyboard better with this unique arcade puzzle game! The game's virtual keyboard maps to your real keyboard, allowing you to push balls and cubes around with each key press. Leverage the game's physics to solve various challenges, from painting the keys on the keyboard to rolling a certain number with a pair of dice.

On Key Up is still in development and needs your input. The goal is to have many more levels than what are currently available, so please share your ideas with us!
